system.notes: Wearer doubles their Degrees of Success with all Successful Dodge Tests. Once per Round can re-roll a failed Dodge Test. Gain one extra Reaction that can only be used to perform the Evasion Reaction each turn.

description.value: Wearer doubles their Degrees of Success with all Successful Dodge Tests. Once per Round can re-roll a failed Dodge Test. Gain one extra Reaction that can only be used to perform the Evasion Reaction each turn.
